lines.text: I know that if I stuffed my thumb into your ass while you counted to 33 C,D,E,F,G- I would get a fever.
Young people are crazy! They have great memories, but they forget anything. They're in a black hole.
No matter where or when, the classics always work.
Kids today are scum! They haven't invented cigarettes or blue jeans. Nothing!
When shit's worth money, the poor won't have assholes.
"Always keeps figures in your head." Mao's been forgotten these days. Yet he was a great cook. He fed all of China.
We're not shit... the world is.
Loneliness forced me to be my own best friend.
Nobody needs atomic bombs or plastic cups.
Me? Actually, I have no friends, male or female.
